title: Additional speaker, YU Fang, CEO of Bitkan, announced as a speaker.
description: We are pleased to announce the addition of YU Fang, CEO of Bitkan, as a speaker. Bitkan held the successful "Shape the Future" Bitcoin Cash themed conference in Hong Kong in September 2017. The BitKan App offers a Bitcoin Cash Wallet service, and is the oldest and most popular quotation and news app in China, especially in the Bitcoin Cash community.
